name: @taqueria/taqueria
description: An easy to use opininated tool for building, testing, and deploying Tezos software

scripts.build-packages: for d in $plugins; do cd $d; npm build; cd ..; done
scripts.update-all: for d in $plugins; do cd $d; contents=$(jq '.name |= env.scope + .' package.json); echo ${contents} > package.json; cd ..; done
scripts.install-all: npm install; for d in $plugins; do cd $d; npm install; cd ..; done
scripts.clean-install-all: npm ci; for d in $plugins; do cd $d; npm ci; cd ..; done
scripts.publish-all: for d in $plugins; do cd $d; npm publish --registry=$GH_REGISTRY --tag $NPM_TAG; cd ..; done

author: ECAD Labs
